title: Conduct Move-Out Inspection
description: A tenant has moved out. The property manager needs to conduct an inspection and process the security deposit.

tasks.description: Retrieve the move-in inspection report for the unit.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pulls up the original inspection report with photos to compare against.

tasks.description: Document the current condition of the unit, noting any damage beyond normal wear and tear.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent logs new damages (e.g., 'Large stain on carpet', 'Hole in wall') in a new inspection report.

tasks.description: Calculate deductions from the security deposit for repairs and generate a disposition letter.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent itemizes repair costs, calculates the security deposit refund, and generates the legal disposition letter.
